translation.success_create_issue: The issue has been created. Thank you very much.
translation.for_add_image_into_bug_report: To add images or files you can use WeTransfer (or other methods to share files) and add the link. Or use GitHub
translation.success_send_mail_for_reset_password: Email was sent to reset the password
translation.do_have_account: Do you already have an account?
translation.slow_loading_info: The loading could be a little slow. I am currently leaving on a free server...
translation.before_opening_issue_info: Before opening an issue it is recommended to talk about the issue first on:
translation.bug_report_info: Create a report to help us improve
translation.feature_request_info: Suggest an idea for this project
translation.writing_or_translation_info: Improve the writing or translation of the game
translation.title: Title
translation.what_happened_helper: Also tell us, what did you expect to happen?
translation.version_helper: What version of our software are you running?
translation.nickname_helper: Add your contact so we can contact you for more information
translation.additional_description_helper: Add a description to help us understand
